turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi there. I'd like to get a drink at Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, which starbucks did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: It's going to be at 130 East Seneca Street in Ithaca, New York.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. And what would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Could I get a iced cafe Mocha?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright and what size?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hello?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi there. I'd like an iced cafe Mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Grande. Grande.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thanks I think there was a little lag there, sorry.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what did you want for the milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Coconut milk, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it and did you want whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I'd like whipped cream, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So that's an grande iced Caffe Mocha with Whipped cream and coconut milk from the Starbucks on Sycamore in Ithica.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope. That's going to be let me look up the address again real quick.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: at 3130 East Sunkist Street.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I get those words mixed up sometimes. My Bad.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So that's an grande iced caffe mocha with whipped cream and coconut milk from the starbucks on East Sennecca in Ithica.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. Your order will be ready in 15 minutes and you'll get the reciept via text.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. That sounds good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I hope you enjoy it.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Have a good day.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You, too. Bye-bye.
